#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

char ch[20005];

int main()
{

    int N,K,T;
    int streak;
    scanf("%d",&T);

    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&N,&K);
        scanf("%s",ch);

        if(N==1)
           {  printf("1\n");  continue; }

           int mxstreak=1;

        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            if(ch[i]==ch[i+1] && i<N-1)
            {
                streak=1;
                while(ch[i]==ch[i+1] && i<N-1)
                {
                    i++,streak++;
                }
                 if(streak>mxstreak)
                    mxstreak=streak;
            }

        }

        int paint=0;

        if(mxstreak>=K)
         {
                for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
                 {
                    if(ch[i]==ch[i+1] && i<N-1)
                     {
                        streak=1;

                        while(ch[i]==ch[i+1] && i<N-1)
                          i++,streak++;

                        if(streak>K)
                            paint+=(streak+K-1)/K;
                        else
                            paint++;
                    }
                    else
                        paint++;

                }
                printf("%d\n",paint);
        }
        else
         printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
